code:
import{api}from"../../helpers/api";// Signup
export const signup=(name,email,password)=>async dispatch=>{const{user}=await api("/auth/signup",{method:"POST",body:{name,email,password}});dispatch({type:"AUTH/SET_USER",payload:user});};// Login
export const login=(email,password)=>async dispatch=>{const{user}=await api("/auth/login",{method:"POST",body:{email,password}});dispatch({type:"AUTH/SET_USER",payload:user});};// Restore session
export const fetchMe=()=>async dispatch=>{const{user}=await api("/auth/me");dispatch({type:"AUTH/SET_USER",payload:user});};// Logout
export const logout=()=>async dispatch=>{await api("/auth/logout",{method:"POST"});dispatch({type:"AUTH/SET_USER",payload:null});};
